description: Based out of Dallas, Garcia Technology Group is are consulting professionals training consultants on practical application of their technology skills to boost ROI for clients and consultants. Led by our founder Hilario Garcia, our consultants are motivated by the ever-changing advancements in the technology industry to continue to enhance their technical skill sets. We build our own apps, aiming to make a difference in value, not focusing primarily on retention. Our objective is to provide our clients with transparency, best practice and diligence. We are committed to providing the highest levels of innovation, quality and excellence.
